TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MasterPage extends System.Web.UI.UserControl

summary.span: 做為只包含 控制項及其個別子控制項之頁面的樣板和合併容器。

span.span: Acts as a template and merging container for pages that are composed only of controls and their respective child controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 主版頁面做為樣板容器並合併您的 ASP.NET Web 應用程式中的內容頁面的頁面。A master page functions as a template container and merging page for content pages in your ASP.NET Web application. 主版頁面會提供便利的方式，跨一組內容頁面的共用結構和內容。Master pages provide a convenient way to share structure and content across a set of content pages. 您可以使用內容的預留位置來定義要從內容頁面的內容取代主版頁面的區段。You use content placeholders to define the sections of the master page to replace with content from the content pages. 當您使用主版頁面和其相關的內容頁面時，您將新增所需的 XHTML 文件標記 (例如`html`， `head`，和`body`) 才能主版頁面，但不能做為獨立網站中建立其他.aspx 檔案 （ASP.NET 網頁）頁面。When you use a master page and its related content pages, you add the required XHTML document tags (such as `html`, `head`, and `body`) only to the master page and no longer create your other .aspx files (ASP.NET pages) as stand-alone Web pages. 內容頁面定義的主版頁面中的預留位置中插入的內容。The content pages define the content to insert into the placeholders in the master page. 當 HTTP 要求發出的頁面上，在執行階段時，主版頁面和內容頁面會結合成單一類別具有相同名稱做為內容頁面。When an HTTP request is made for a page at run time, the master page and content pages are combined into a single class with the same name as the content pages. 編譯所產生，合併的類別衍生自類別。The resulting compiled, merged class derives from the class. 主版頁面可以包含直接的標記和伺服器控制項，以及容器控制項。A master page can contain direct markup and server controls, as well as container controls. 放在主版頁面以外的每個項目因合併主版頁面和內容頁面的所有頁面上呈現控制項。Every element that is placed in the master page outside of a control is rendered on all pages that result from merging the master page and content pages. 主版頁面與相關的每個內容頁面必須參考主版頁面中的`MasterPageFile`的屬性及其[@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4)指示詞。Each content page that is related to the master page must reference the master page in a `MasterPageFile` attribute of its [@ Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f06cf9e5-22bb-461d-8b8f-549e53ff40a4) directive. 內容頁面可以只包含`@ Page`指示詞和一或多個控制項。Content pages can contain only a `@ Page` directive and one or more controls. 所有頁面的文字、 標記和伺服器控制項都必須放在控制項。All of your page text, markup, and server controls must be placed within controls. 您識別控制項的主版頁面控制項，會藉由設定相關聯屬性控制項。You identify the control of a master page that a control is associated with by setting the property of the control. 在執行階段，從每個動態內容要求的頁面中的控制會與相關的確切位置中的主版頁面合併控制項。At run time, the dynamic content from each control in the requested page is merged with the master page in the exact location of the related control. 任何其他的標記和主版頁面中的控制項不受影響。Any other markup and controls in the master page are unaffected. 在這兩個主要類別，並在 [內容] 頁面上，您可以定義事件處理常式。Event handlers can be defined in both the master class and on the content page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 主版頁面和內容頁中的事件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b3ab2d01-9e37-4788-82d0-c6065e3ff5bd)。For more information, see [Events in ASP.NET Master and Content Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b3ab2d01-9e37-4788-82d0-c6065e3ff5bd). 類別是與副檔名.master 檔案相關聯。The class is associated with files that have a .master extension. 這些檔案會在執行階段做為編譯物件，並會在伺服器記憶體中快取。These files are compiled at run time as objects and are cached in server memory. 主版頁面會提供給透過 [內容] 頁面屬性的基底類別。The master page is made available to the content page through the property of the base class. 屬性傳回的主版頁面的執行個體; 不過，它型別，做為基底類別。The property returns the instance of the master page; however, it is typed as the base class. 若要存取控制、 屬性和主版頁面中，函式屬性都可以轉換成物件。To access controls, properties, and functions of the master page, the property can be cast to a object. 主版頁面的類別名稱使用定義`ClassName`的屬性[@ Master](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d263ecb-5169-4b28-8ad9-f5c82302ca99)指示詞。The class name of the master page is defined using the `ClassName` attribute of the [@ Master](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3d263ecb-5169-4b28-8ad9-f5c82302ca99) directive. > [!NOTE] > .Master 副檔名的檔案不會提供給瀏覽器中。Files with .master extensions are not served to a browser. 適用於主版頁面的指示詞是指位於相同物件。The directives that are valid on a master page are the same as those that are available on a object. 它們可以包含下列屬性：They can include the following attributes: - `AutoEventWireup` - `ClassName` - `CodeFile` - `CompilerMode` - `CompilerOptions` - `Debug` - `Description` - `EnableTheming` - `EnableViewState` - `Explicit` - `Inherits` - `Language` - `LinePragmas` - `MasterPageFile` - `Src` - `Strict` - `WarningLevel` 主版頁面指示詞不會覆寫個別內容頁面上的指示詞。Master page directives do not override the directives on individual content pages. 通常會以宣告方式建立主版頁面。Master pages are most often created declaratively. 如果您想要以程式設計方式建立主版頁面，直接衍生自類別。If you want to create a master page programmatically, derive directly from the class. 除了擴充類別，您必須建立.master 檔案，以視覺方式顯示在原始程式檔中叫用的類別相關聯的使用者介面 (UI)。In addition to extending the class, you must create the .master file to visually display the user interface (UI) that is associated with the classes that you have invoked in your source file. > [!NOTE] > 當您建立主版頁面，藉由先建立您自己的類別時，您必須包含所有的命名空間所需的頁面所用的類別。When you create a master page by creating your own class first, you must include all namespaces that are required for the classes that are used by the page. 如需有關主版頁面的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 主版頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b)。For more information about master pages, see [ASP.NET Master Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b). ## Examples 本節包含四個程式碼範例：This section contains four code examples: - 第一個程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式建立主版頁面。The first code example demonstrates how to create a master page declaratively. - 第二個程式碼範例代表第一個程式碼範例中所建立的主版頁面與相關聯的內容頁面。The second code example represents the content page that is associated with the master page that was created in the first code example. - 第三個程式碼範例示範如何將屬性加入至主版頁面。The third code example demonstrates how to add a property to a master page. - 第四個程式碼範例示範如何使用內容頁面存取主版頁面上的公用屬性。The fourth code example demonstrates how to use a content page to access a public property on the master page. 下列範例示範如何以宣告方式建立主版頁面，以及加入一些內容，使用內容頁面。The following example demonstrates how to create a master page declaratively and to add some content to it using a content page. 第一個網頁是名為.master 頁面`MasterPageSample_1.master`。The first Web page is the .master page named `MasterPageSample_1.master`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> MasterPage Example
``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> MasterPage Example
``` 下列範例表示相關聯的內容頁面`MasterPageSample_1.master`。The following example represents the content page that is associated with `MasterPageSample_1.master`. 它包含控制項，並識別內容，會使用相關聯的控制項屬性。It contains a control and identifies the control that the content is associated with by using the property. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPageSample_1cs.master" Title="Content Page"%> Hello, Master Pages! ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPageSample_1vb.master" Title="Content Page"%> Hello, Master Pages! ``` 下列範例示範如何將屬性加入至主版頁面。The following example demonstrates how to add a property to a master page. `ClassName`屬性用來命名主版頁面。The `ClassName` attribute is used to name the master page. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" ClassName="MasterExample" %> MasterPage Example
``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" ClassName="MasterExample" %> MasterPage Example
``` 下列範例示範如何使用內容頁面存取的公用屬性`SiteName`在上述範例中，程式碼位於主版頁面。The following example shows how to use a content page to access the public property `SiteName` on the master page in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPage.master" Title="MasterPage Example" %> Hello, Master Pages! ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/MasterPage.master" Title="MasterPage Example" %> Hello, Master Pages! ```

Nested Master Pages

summary.span: 將 控制項加入至 字典中。

span.span: Adds a control to the dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的主版頁面的類別可以加入控制項，成為字典使用方法。Derived master page classes can add controls to the dictionary using the method. 衍生型別不通常會覆寫方法。Derived types do not typically override the method.

exception.span: 具有相同名稱的 控制項已經存在於 字典中。

span.span: A control with the same name already exists in the dictionary.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Friend ReadOnly Property ContentPlaceHolders As IList
protected public: property System::Collections::IList ^ ContentPlaceHolders { System::Collections::IList ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得主版頁面用來定義不同內容區的 控制項清單。

span.span: Gets a list of controls that the master page uses to define different content regions.

value.span: 控制項的 ，主版頁面使用這些控制項做為內容頁面上所找到之 控制項的預留位置。

span.span: An of controls that the master page uses as placeholders for controls found in content pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的主版頁面類別能夠存取屬性，列出目前主要所包含的控制項。Derived master page classes access the property to list the current controls that are contained by the master. 衍生型別不通常會覆寫屬性。Derived types do not typically override the property.

protected public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ ContentTemplates { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得與主版頁面關聯的內容控制項清單。

span.span: Gets a list of content controls that are associated with the master page.

value.span: 與主版頁面關聯之內容控制項的 。

span.span: An of content controls associated with the master page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 衍生的主版頁面類別能夠存取屬性，以擷取目前控制項、 相關聯的內容頁面所定義。Derived master page classes access the property to retrieve the current controls, as defined by associated content pages. 衍生型別不通常會覆寫屬性。Derived types do not typically override the property.

summary.span: 在巢狀主版頁面案例中，取得目前主版頁面的父主版頁面。

span.span: Gets the parent master page of the current master in nested master pages scenarios.

value.span: 目前主版頁面的父主版頁面，如果目前的主版頁面沒有父代，則為 。

span.span: The master page that is the parent of the current master page; otherwise, , if the current master page has no parent.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 屬性是唯讀的因為無法在執行階段建置主版頁面階層。The property is read-only, because master page hierarchies cannot be built at run time. ## Examples 本節包含三個程式碼範例。This section contains three code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何建立巢狀主版頁面`.`第二個程式碼範例示範如何參考第一個程式碼範例中所建立的主版頁面。The first code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page`.` The second code example demonstrates how to reference the master page that was created in the first code example. 第三個程式碼範例示範如何使用內容的頁面參考第二個程式碼範例中所建立的主版頁面。The third code example demonstrates how to use a content page to reference the master page that was created in the second code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立巢狀主版頁面，並代表名為的父主版頁面`ParentMasterPage_1`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page and represents the parent master page named `ParentMasterPage_1`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用巢狀主版頁面名稱為`ChildMasterPage_1`參考上述程式碼範例中所建立的主版頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to use a nested master page named `ChildMasterPage_1` that references the master page that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1cs.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1vb.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用名為的內容頁面`ContentPage`參考`ChildMasterPage_1`上述的程式碼範例中建立。The following code example demonstrates how to use a content page named `ContentPage` that references the `ChildMasterPage_1` that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1cs.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1vb.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ```

span.span: Nested Master Pages

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the master page that contains the current content.

value.span: 目前主版頁面的父主版頁面名稱，如果目前的主版頁面沒有父代，則為 。

span.span: The name of the master page that is the parent of the current master page; otherwise, , if the current master page has no parent.

remarks.format:
## Examples 本節包含三個程式碼範例。This section contains three code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何建立巢狀主版頁面`.`第二個程式碼範例示範如何參考第一個程式碼範例中所建立的主版頁面。The first code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page`.` The second code example demonstrates how to reference the master page that was created in the first code example. 第三個程式碼範例示範如何使用內容的頁面參考第二個程式碼範例中所建立的主版頁面。The third code example demonstrates how to use a content page to reference the master page that was created in the second code example. 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立巢狀主版頁面，並代表名為的父主版頁面`ParentMasterPage_1`。The following code example demonstrates how to create a nested master page and represents the parent master page named `ParentMasterPage_1`. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" %> Nested Master Page Example

This is content in the parent master page.

``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用巢狀主版頁面名稱為`ChildMasterPage_1`參考上述程式碼範例中所建立的主版頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to use a nested master page named `ChildMasterPage_1` that references the master page that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Master Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1cs.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` ```vb <%@ Master Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ParentMasterPage_1vb.master" %>

This is the content of a nested Master Page.

 ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用名為的內容頁面`ContentPage`參考`ChildMasterPage_1`上述的程式碼範例中建立。The following code example demonstrates how to use a content page named `ContentPage` that references the `ChildMasterPage_1` that was created in the preceding code example. ```csharp <%@ Page Language="C#" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1cs.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ``` ```vb <%@ Page Language="VB" MasterPageFile="~/ChildMasterPage_1vb.master" Title="Untitled Page"%> This is the content of a Content control. ```

exception.span: 屬性只能在 事件 (含) 之前設定。

span.span: The property can only be set in or before the event.
Nested Master Pages
